subject: UPS DELIVERING SERVICE
body:
UPS DELIVERING SERVICE
Offers Shipping Logistics Management, Supply Chain Managementand to
anywhere in the world. Company Address:
55 Glenlake Parkway NE
Atlanta, GA 30328
United States
UPS DELIVERING COMPANY LTD with worldwide delivery at it's best. We
are pleased to be at your service. UPS DELIVERING COMPANY LTD we are
here to serve you better.
Good Day Dear Customer.
The UPS  Delivering Service, are hereby writing to inform you that the
government of the United state of America has decided to send your
funds  inheritance through UPS Courier Service delivery.  The
government deposited your inheritance  ($17.5M) of funds with this
company yesterday with your full name and home address where to
delivery the package. For your information, the government paid
delivery charges.
This is to bring to your notice that the needful documents for this
delivery has been issued in your name except one. We issued two
needful documents in your favor. Custom clearance certificate
Anti-drug certificate. But did not issue an insurance document. I went
to the Insurance Company this morning to issue an insurance document
on your behalf. And the Insurance Company is charging $50.00 to be
paid before they provide us with an insurance document.
I want to reassure you of our willingness to delivery your package as
soon as possible. Again, your package is among the packages we are
about to dispatch this week.
 We tried our best to obtain the two
documents on your behalf. Now we want you to pay the Insurance Company
so they can provide us with insurance documents so we can  dispatch
your package.
 Once payment is made the Insurance Company will issue us
an insurance document.  And we will then dispatch your package in 7
hour Insurance Company provides us with the document.
You are to pay the insurance fee through Gift card iTunes card or
steam wallet card. It is fast to  get it done today .
Forward the Gift card once the payment is made and send me the
pictures so that i will redeem it to cash . We are waiting on the
payment details to enable the Insurance Company to provide us with
needed documents so we can dispatch your package. for more information
message us Email..( 
upsdeliveringcompanyltd4@gmail.com
              Sincerely,
               Mrs Jasmine Pierre
               Director UPS Company

subject: Re: UPS DELIVERING SERVICE
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information about UPS Delivering Service and the government's decision to send my funds through UPS Courier Service delivery. It sounds like a convenient option.

I understand that the needful documents for the delivery have been issued in my name, except for the insurance document. Could you please provide more details about why an insurance document is necessary? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the process.

Also, could you explain how the payment for the insurance fee through a gift card or steam wallet card works? Is there a specific amount that needs to be paid? And once I make the payment, how will I receive confirmation that it has been received?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Robert
